__e: Also because... because of what they're capable of...
I'm not sure I know what either one of you would do anymore.
Just as I thought, the two of you, you can't get through a simple thing like that.
They'll do anything, say anything to gain our trust, but they can't be trusted.
I think someone can be driven to do anything, when their life's in jeopardy.
At least five of your relatives are capable of every move that's been made so far.
I think... . I'm glad we're both here able to wonder about it.
Just as I thought, the two of you, you can't get through a simple thing like that.
If being with you has taught me anything, it's that we all have the capability to change. And the future's not written by our past.
